ledgers: select ledger_name, fund_name, current_allocation as fund_allocation, sum(current_allocation) over (partition by ledger_name) as ledger_allocation from ledgers
ledgersWithParam: select ledger_name, fund_name, current_allocation as fund_allocation, sum(current_allocation) over (partition by ledger_name) as ledger_allocation from ledgers where fiscal_period_name = $1
inv_stat_date_ledg: with win_fun as (select date_trunc('day', invoice_status_date) as inv_date, amount from invoices where ledger_name like $1) select inv_date, sum(sum(amount)) over (order by inv_date asc) as cumsum from win_fun group by inv_date
inv_stat_date_fund: with win_fun as (select date_trunc('day', invoice_status_date) as inv_date, amount from invoices where ledger_name like $1 and parent_fund like $2) select inv_date, sum(sum(amount)) over (order by inv_date asc) as cumsum from win_fun group by inv_date
inv_stat_date_all: with win_fun as (select date_trunc('day', invoice_status_date) as inv_date, amount from invoices) select inv_date, sum(sum(amount)) over (order by inv_date asc) as cumsum from win_fun group by inv_date
